H0.text: What is the more common term for the affliction called epistaxis the occurrence of which suggests sexual arousal in Japanese manga and anime. Nasal Hemorrhage

H1.text: What is the more common term for the affliction called epistaxis the occurrence of which suggests sexual arousal in Japanese manga and anime. Bloody Nose

H2.text: What is the more common term for the affliction called epistaxis the occurrence of which suggests sexual arousal in Japanese manga and anime. Nosebleed

H3.text: What is the more common term for the affliction called epistaxis the occurrence of which suggests sexual arousal in Japanese manga and anime. Noseblood

A4.text: In Japanese manga and anime, nosebleeding often indicates sexual arousal.
